title: UME Meca seminars @ENSTA, Paris-Saclay campus
text:
This wiki serves as a central hub for the UME seminar series at ENSTA on the Paris-Saclay campus.
Organisers: Camilla Zolesi (camilla.zolesi[at]ensta-paris.fr) & Alexandre Daby-Seesaram (alexandre.daby-seesaram[at]ensta-paris.fr)
